snippet: Home prices in northern Portugal fell by as much as 35 percent after the global real estate crisis of 2008, but have held steady in recent years.
abstract: International House Hunting column; 13-bedroom compound on Portugal's northern coast, 50 miles from Porto, is listed at $1.64 million; information about market and tips for buying properties in Portugal highlighted.
lead_paragraph: Home prices in northern Portugal fell by as much as 35 percent after the global real estate crisis of 2008, but have held steady in recent years.
